verses.verse: <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H2004>it,<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on <S%H7126>it,<s%> and offered <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which he had not commanded <S%H6680>them.<s%>
And <S%H784>fire<s%> came <S%H3318>forth<s%> from before <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H4191>them,<s%> and they died <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "This is what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H559>of,<s%> saying, <S%H6942><s%> 'I will show myself holy to those who come <S%H7138>near<s%> <S%H6440>me,<s%> and before all the <S%H5971>people<s%> I will be <S%H3513>glorified.<s%>'" <S%H175>Aaron<s%> held his <S%H1826>peace.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael<s%> and <S%H469>Elzaphan,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%> the <S%H1730>uncle<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7126>them,<s%> "Draw near, <S%H5375>carry<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>"
So they drew <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H5375>carried<s%> them in their <S%H3801>coats<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and to <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H7218>"Don't<s%> let the hair of your heads go <S%H6544>loose,<s%> neither <S%H6533>tear<s%> your <S%H899>clothes;<s%> that you <S%H4191>don't<s%> die, and that he not be <S%H7107>angry<s%> with all the <S%H5712>congregation:<s%> but let your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1058>bewail<s%> the <S%H8316>burning<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H8313>kindled.<s%>

You shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> lest you <S%H4191>die;<s%> for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is on <S%H6213>you.<s%>" They did according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H8354>"Drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H8354>drink,<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> nor your sons with <S%H935>you,<s%> when you go into the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> that you <S%H4191>don't<s%> die: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations:<s%>
and that you are to make a <S%H914>distinction<s%> between the <S%H6944>holy<s%> and the <S%H2455>common,<s%> and between the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean;<s%>

and that you are to <S%H3384>teach<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to them <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and to <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> who were <S%H3498>left,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> that <S%H3498>remains<s%> of the <S%H4503>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it without <S%H4682>yeast<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar;<s%> for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy;<s%>

and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> because it is your <S%H2706>portion,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H2706>portion,<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> made by <S%H801>fire:<s%> for so I am <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

The <S%H8573>waved<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and the <S%H8641>heaved<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> and your sons, and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with <S%H2706>you:<s%> for they are given as your portion, and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H2706>portion,<s%> <S%H5414>out<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H8641>heaved<s%> <S%H7785>thigh<s%> and the <S%H8573>waved<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> they shall <S%H935>bring<s%> with the offerings made by <S%H801>fire<s%> of the <S%H2459>fat,<s%> to <S%H5130>wave<s%> it for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> and it shall be <S%H1121>yours,<s%> and your sons' with <S%H2706>you,<s%> as a portion <S%H5769>forever;<s%> as <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1875>diligently<s%> <S%H1875>inquired<s%> about the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> <S%H8313>and,<s%> behold, it was burned: and he was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and with <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> who were <S%H3498>left,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Why <S%H398>haven't<s%> you eaten the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> since it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and he has <S%H5414>given<s%> it you to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> its <S%H1818>blood<s%> was not <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H6441>inner<s%> part of the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%> you <S%H398>certainly<s%> should have <S%H398>eaten<s%> it in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3117>"Behold,<s%> this day they have <S%H7126>offered<s%> their sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> and their burnt <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and such things as these have <S%H7122>happened<s%> to <S%H398>me:<s%> and if I had eaten the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> would it have been <S%H3190>pleasing<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>"
When <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3190>that,<s%> it was pleasing in his sight.
